data.prayer: Father, help your children in Al Bahah, Saudi Arabia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Bahah, Saudi Arabia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 2,016 believers in the state of Al Bahah.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 188 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Al Bahah, Saudi Arabia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,016 believers in the state of Al Bahah to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Bedouin people might believe through him.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Al Bahah, Saudi Arabia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,016 believers in Al Bahah to start simple multiplying churches in their homes.
Over 95.98 percent of the people of Al Bahah are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

location.name: Al Bahah
